sentences.en: A small ridge of sand separated the field from the beach.
sentences.cn: 一条小小的沙脊把田野和海滩分隔开来。

sentences.en: Even among seasoned mountaineers Pinnacle Ridge is considered quite a tough proposition.
sentences.cn: 即使在经验丰富的登山者中，平纳克尔峰也被认为是很难攀登的。

sentences.en: Every man who could fight was now committed to defending the ridge.
sentences.cn: 每个能够参加战斗的男子现在都决心要保卫这条山脊。

sentences.en: I looked across the mountains, ridge upon ridge.
sentences.cn: 我放眼绵延起伏的群山。

sentences.en: Larks were rising in spirals from the ridge.
sentences.cn: 云雀从山脊上盘旋着飞起。

sentences.en: Rammick lives high on a ridge in a 400-home subdivision.
sentences.cn: 拉米克住在高耸的山脊上一片有400户人家的地方。

sentences.en: Riding on the ridge of the bridge, the proud bride shouts loudly to the cloud.
sentences.cn: 骄傲的新娘骑在桥脊上对着云大声喊。

sentences.en: The fawn ran to the top of the ridge.
The infantry were advancing to attack the ridge.
sentences.cn: 步兵部队正在向前挺进攻打山脊。

sentences.en: The sky above the ridge of mountains brightened.
sentences.cn: 山脊上方的天空变得明亮起来。

sentences.en: The tank stopped with the long snout of its gun turned to the ridge.
sentences.cn: 坦克停了下来，长长的炮管转过来瞄准了山脊。

sentences.en: The two young men advanced cautiously towards the ridge.
sentences.cn: 两个年轻人小心翼翼地向小丘前进.

sentences.en: There were dead Japanese lying all about this ridge.
sentences.cn: 山梁的前后左右都是日军的遗尸.

sentences.en: We clambered up the hillside to the ridge above.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着山坡费力地爬上了山脊.

sentences.en: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

sentences.en: We walked along the mountain ridge.

words.tran_cn: 成脊状（ridge的过去式和过去分词）
悬崖,山脉,陡峻的山脊;分水岭,分界线;垄,埂
脊骨,脊柱;颏,下巴,鳍,脊椎;背,背部

phrases.tran_cn: 橡树岭（美国田纳西州东部城市）
山脊线；甲板中线；分水岭

trans.tran_cn: 背脊，峰，隆起线，山脊，山脉，海脊，高压脊，皱摺，田埂
trans.tran_en: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain
